dmca.title: [ABUSE] FW: http://datingdirectcom.heartbeat-railway.co.uk
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Policy
Enforcement
Posted At: Tuesday, May 30, 2006 10:15 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: http://datingdirectcom.heartbeat-railway.co.uk]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: http://datingdirectcom.heartbeat-railway.co.uk]


For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] FW: http://datingdirectcom.heartbeat-railway.co.uk
Date:         Tue, 30 May 2006 15:55:03 +0100
From:         Yvonne Onomor <yxo@adlexsolicitors.co.uk>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>, <admins@theplanet.com>



Peter Pathos

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas

TEXAS 750207

U.S.A.







Dear Sir,


www.heartbeat-railway.co.uk <http://www.heartbeat-railway.co.uk/>
*("the Website")*

We write further to our email of April 27 (inserted below) concerning the Website
and we are surprised that we have had no response from you.

Furthermore, despite informing you that the Website constitutes a serious
infringement of our client's rights, you appear to have taken no steps to rmove this
site, which remains operational.

We therefore inform you that we have been instructed by our client to issue legal
proceedings against you and all entities and individuals concerned without further
warning to you.

Yours faithfully,


Adlex Solicitors
www.adlexsolicitors.co.uk <http://www.adlexsolicitors.co.uk>
Tel: +44 (0) 207 317 8404
Fax: +44 (0) 207 317 8405
Mob: +44 (0) 7775 635 835
76A Belsize Lane, London NW3 5BJ

The sender does not guarantee that this message including any attachment is secure
or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be privileged or otherwise protected
from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it
or its contents. Please telephone or email the sender and delete entirely from your
system.


------------------------------------------------------------------------
*From:* Yvonne Onomor [mailto:yxo@adlexsolicitors.co.uk]
*Sent:* 27 April 2006 11:37
*To:* 'abuse@theplanet.com'
*Subject:* FW: http://datingdirectcom.heartbeat-railway.co.uk

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas

TEXAS 750207

U.S.A.



Dear Sirs,



www.heartbeat-railway.co.uk <http://www.heartbeat-railway.co.uk/>
*("the Website")*

* *

We act for DatingDirect.com Limited of The Axis, Holliday Street, Birmingham B1 1TF.



Our client has been trading under the names "Dating Direct" and "DatingDirect.com"
via a website at that domain since January 1999. It offers a respectable online
dating agency service for singles seeking serious friendships and relationships. Our
client is a major player in online dating and currently has over 2.5 million
members. Our client spent almost
